content: Mazarca is back up! Join now: ws://30.ip.gl.ply.gg:50343.

Major site update! Here is what's new:

  • Enhanced look and style
  • Added a gallery of in-game world screenshots
  • Added Announcements page for important news on the server
  • Added Navigation bar for all the new stuff

Added new plugins:

  • LuckPerms & Vault
  • EssentialsXChat
  • TAB

Server now has rank system, as well as better chat and tablist formatting
IP list on the Homepage has been updated!

Big server update! Added lobby server with a cool parkour course.
Also, now there's a brand-new superflat server with RandomDrops plugin - test your luck!
Added a status page for the server and eaglercraft.com website
Moved site navigation into a dropdown menu with icons

Server update: New lobby and new server - Minigames!
Site update: added info about new servers (see Homepage)
There are now maces and wind charges in Anarchy!! Go check 'em out!

Many custom items were added!
Check the new Recipes page to see how they're crafted
Server is currently down! Will be up after some time, please wait.
